fields.name: value
fields.desc: Whether this switch is on or off.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user toggles the switch on or off.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.activeColor} The color to use when this switch is on. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: activeTrackColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.activeTrackColor} The color to use on the track when this switch is on. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: inactiveThumbColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.inactiveThumbColor} The color to use on the thumb when this switch is off. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: inactiveTrackColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.inactiveTrackColor} The color to use on the track when this switch is off. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: activeThumbImage
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.activeThumbImage} An image to use on the thumb of this switch when the switch is on. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: onActiveThumbImageError
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.onActiveThumbImageError} An optional error callback for errors emitted when loading [activeThumbImage]. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: inactiveThumbImage
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.inactiveThumbImage} An image to use on the thumb of this switch when the switch is off. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: onInactiveThumbImageError
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.onInactiveThumbImageError} An optional error callback for errors emitted when loading [inactiveThumbImage]. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: thumbColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.thumbColor} The color of this [Switch]'s thumb.

fields.name: trackColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.trackColor} The color of this [Switch]'s track.

fields.name: trackOutlineColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.trackOutlineColor} The outline color of this [Switch]'s track.

fields.name: trackOutlineWidth
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.trackOutlineWidth} The outline width of this [Switch]'s track.

fields.name: thumbIcon
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.thumbIcon} The icon to use on the thumb of this switch

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.materialTapTargetSize} Configures the minimum size of the tap target. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: applyCupertinoTheme
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.cupertino.CupertinoSwitch.applyTheme}

fields.name: dragStartBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.cupertino.CupertinoSwitch.dragStartBehavior}

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the button's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The color for the button's [Material] when a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.overlayColor} The color for the switch's [Material].

fields.name: splashRadius
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.switch.splashRadius} The splash radius of the circular [Material] ink response. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.inkwell.onFocusChange}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space to surround the child inside the bounds of the [Switch].

nodes.name: Basic Usage of Switch
desc: When onChanged, callbacks for true, null, and false states
